title: Weather Forecast Watch Face
summary: This is WatchFace for Android Wear with weather forecast.
description: This is WatchFace for Android Wear with weather forecast.It's free and easy to download.FEATURES-WatchFace gets the weather forecast at your exact location automatically by using GPS.-You can choose a daily weather forecast report or a 3 hour weather forecast report on both the round and square models.-Use the "Update Weather Data" button to update the weather forecast information.-To learn about the version and license of your application, click on the "ABOUT" button of the application.
descriptionHTML:
This is WatchFace for Android Wear with weather forecast.
It's free and easy to download.



FEATURES
-WatchFace gets the weather forecast at your exact location automatically by using GPS.
-You can choose a daily weather forecast report or a 3 hour weather forecast report on both the round and square models.
-Use the "Update Weather Data" button to update the weather forecast information.
-To learn about the version and license of your application, click on the "ABOUT" button of the application.
